reopt_seconds.description: Time spent solving scenario | UNUSED as of 2024-04-02

reopt_bau_seconds.description: Time spent solving base-case scenario | UNUSED as of 2024-04-02

annual_renewable_electricity_pct.description: Fraction of annual renewable electricity - 0 for none, 1 for all, over 1 for more generated than consumed

load_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of electric load

critical_load_series_kw.description: Hourly critical load for outage simulator. Values are either uploaded by user, or determined from typical load (either uploaded or simulated) and critical_load_fraction.

annual_calculated_kwh.description: Annual energy consumption calculated by summing up 8760 load profile

npv.description: Net present value of savings realized by the project

lifecycle_capital_costs_plus_om_after_ta.description: Capital cost for all technologies plus present value of operations and maintenance over anlaysis period

lifecycle_MG_upgrade_and_fuel_cost.description: Cost in US dollars to make a distributed energy system islandable from the grid. Determined by multiplying the total capital costs of resultant energy systems from REopt (such as PV and Storage system) with the input value for microgrid_upgrade_cost_fraction (which defaults to 0.30).

location.description: Indicates location of PV. Available options are roof and ground.

annual_energy_produced_kwh.description: Average annual energy produced by the PV system over one year

average_yearly_energy_exported_kwh.description: Average annual energy exported by the PV system

year_one_energy_produced_kwh.description: Year one energy produced by the PV system

electric_to_storage_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of PV charging

electric_to_load_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of PV serving load

electric_to_grid_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of PV exporting to grid

lifecycle_om_cost_after_tax_bau.description: Lifetime O & M costfor existing PV system.

station_latitude.description: The latitude of the station usedfor weather resource data

station_longitude.description: The longitude of the station usedfor weather resource data

station_distance_km.description: The distance from the weather resource station from the input site

annual_energy_produced_kwh.description: Energy produced by the wind system over one year

average_yearly_energy_exported_kwh.description: Average annual energy exported by the wind system

electric_to_storage_series_kw.description: Year one wind to battery time series

electric_to_load_series_kw.description: Year one wind to load time series

electric_to_grid_series_kw.description: Year one wind to grid time series

electric_to_load_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of battery serving load

electric_to_grid_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of battery exporting to grid

soc_series_fraction.description: Year one hourly time series of battery state of charge

year_one_energy_cost_before_tax.description: Optimal year one utility energy cost

year_one_demand_cost_before_tax.description: Optimal year one utility demand cost

year_one_fixed_cost_before_tax.description: Optimal year one utility fixed cost

year_one_min_charge_adder_before_tax.description: Optimal year one utility minimum charge adder

year_one_energy_cost_before_tax_bau.description: Business as usual year one utility energy cost

year_one_demand_cost_before_tax_bau.description: Business as usual year one utility demand cost

year_one_fixed_cost_before_tax_bau.description: Business as usual year one utility fixed cost

year_one_min_charge_adder_before_tax_bau.description: Business as usual year one utility minimum charge adder

lifecycle_energy_cost_after_tax.description: Total utility energy cost over the lifecycle,after - tax

lifecycle_demand_cost_after_tax.description: Optimal total lifecycle utility demand cost over the analysis period,after - tax

lifecycle_fixed_cost_after_tax.description: Total utility fixed cost over the lifecycle,after - tax

lifecycle_energy_cost_after_tax_bau.description: Business as usual total utility energy cost over the lifecycle,after - tax

lifecycle_demand_cost_after_tax_bau.description: Business as usual total lifecycle utility demand cost over the analysis period,after - tax

lifecycle_fixed_cost_after_tax_bau.description: Business as usual total utility fixed cost over the lifecycle,after - tax

lifecycle_export_benefit_after_tax.description: Totalexport benefit cost over the lifecycle,after - tax

lifecycle_min_charge_adder_after_tax_bau.description: Business as usual total utility minimum charge adder

year_one_bill_before_tax.description: Optimal year one total utility bill

year_one_bill_before_tax_bau.description: Business as usual year one total utility bill

year_one_export_benefit_before_tax.description: Optimal year one value of exported energy

year_one_energy_cost_series_us_dollars_p.description: Year one hourly energy costs | UNUSED as of 2024-04-02

year_one_demand_cost_series_us_dollars_p.description: Year one hourly demand costs | UNUSED as of 2024-04-02

electric_to_load_series_kw.description: Year one grid to load time series

annual_energy_supplied_kwh.description: Year one hourly time series of power from grid to load

annual_energy_supplied_kwh_bau.description: Year one hourly time series of power from grid to load in bau scenario

fuel_used_gal.description: Generator fuel used to meet critical load during grid outage.

fuel_used_gal_bau.description: Generator fuel used to meet critical load during grid outage in baucase.

average_yearly_energy_exported_kwh.description: Average annual energy exported by the diesel generator

annual_energy_produced_kwh.description: Year one energy produced by the diesel generator

electric_to_storage_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of diesel generator charging

electric_to_load_series_kw.description: Year one generator to load time series.

electric_to_grid_series_kw.description: Year one hourly time series of diesel generator exporting to grid

lifecycle_fixed_om_cost_bau.description: Lifetime fixed O & M costfor existing diesel generator system in baucase.

lifecycle_variable_om_cost_after_tax_bau.description: Lifetime variable(based on kwh produced) O & M costfor existing diesel generator system.

year_one_variable_om_cost_before_tax_bau.description: Year one variable(based on kwh produced) O & M costfor existing diesel generator system.

lifecycle_variable_om_cost_after_tax.description: Total lifecycle variable(based on kwh produced) O & M costfor existing + newly recommended diesel generator system

year_one_variable_om_cost_before_tax.description: Year one variable(based on kwh produced) O & M costfor existing + newly recommended diesel generator system

lifecycle_fuel_costs_after_tax.description: Total lifecycle fuel costfor existing + newly recommended diesel generator system

year_one_fuel_cost_before_tax.description: Year one fuel costfor existing + newly recommended diesel generator system

lifecycle_fuel_cost_after_tax_bau.description: Total lifecycle fuel costfor existing diesel generator system

year_one_fuel_cost_before_tax_bau.description: Year one fuel costfor existing diesel generator system
